snippet: GlaxoSmithKline is making changes worldwide that are meant to produce about $1.6 billion in annual savings within about three years —
abstract: GlaxoSmithKline says it will eliminate about 900 jobs in marketing and research in Research Triangle Park, NC, by the end of 2015 as company restructures.
lead_paragraph: GlaxoSmithKline is making changes worldwide that are meant to produce about $1.6 billion in annual savings within about three years —

headline.main: Glaxo Plans Hundreds of Layoffs at U.S. Unit
headline.print_headline: Glaxo Plans Hundreds of Layoffs at U.S. Unit
